channel.title: Making a item unweildable to non-owners?

item.title: Making a item unweildable to non-owners?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

You probobly would need to do it seperate under public boolean process

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11189 && && playerRights <= 2) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon); sendMessage("You have to be owner to wield this!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Making a item unweildable to non-owners?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I tried this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11189) // admin staff { if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("You must be owner to use this staff"); remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon); disconnected = true; } else if(playerRights >= 3) { if(icebar == 0){ inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 20, 5); AttackingOn2.uberentangle(); inCombat(); //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); actionTimer = 15; icebar = 10; PkingDelay = 15; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } }
But it still lets them hold it Anyone know?

Read full topic
